<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This file defines a hazard recognizer for the SystemZ scheduler.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This class is used by the SystemZ scheduling strategy to maintain</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the state during scheduling, and provide cost functions for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// scheduling candidates. This includes:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#42; Decoder grouping. A decoder group can maximally hold 3 uops, and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions that always begin a new group should be scheduled when</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the current decoder group is empty.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#42; Processor resources usage. It is beneficial to balance the use of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// resources.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A goal is to consider all instructions, also those outside of any</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// scheduling region. Such instructions are &quot;advanced&quot; past and include</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// single instructions before a scheduling region, branches etc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A block that has only one predecessor continues scheduling with the state</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of it (which may be updated by emitting branches).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ===---------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expected normal instruction to fit in non-full group!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzhazardrecognizer/#a0fdaca7e15aaaa6d903d0498220b8cc1"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzhazardrecognizer/#a0fdaca7e15aaaa6d903d0498220b8cc1">SystemZHazardRecognizer::groupingCost</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcschedclassdesc">MCSchedClassDesc</a> &#42;SC = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/systemzhazardrecognizer/#a4a0f2858cdd379056abfa2531e7da961">getSchedClass</a>(SU);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!SC-&gt;isValid())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If SU begins new group, it can either break a current group early</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// or fit naturally if current group is empty (negative cost).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SC-&gt;BeginGroup) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurrGroupSize)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 3 - CurrGroupSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> -1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Similarly, a group-ending SU may either fit well (last in group), or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// end the group prematurely.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SC-&gt;EndGroup) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> resultingGroupSize =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">      (CurrGroupSize + getNumDecoderSlots(SU));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (resultingGroupSize &lt; 3)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (3 - resultingGroupSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> -1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// An instruction with 4 register operands will not fit in last slot.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurrGroupSize == 2 &amp;&amp; has4RegOps(SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#afc98c2c5417cad1a90fc4fe241fe8ba4">getInstr</a>()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Most instructions can be placed in any decoder slot.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SystemZHazardRecognizer::isFPdOpPreferred&#95;distance(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42;SU)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a> (SU-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit/#a4ac4d36cb59a4bbf5d93513dad0ff0e9">isUnbuffered</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If this is the first FPd op, it should be scheduled high.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LastFPdOpCycleIdx == UINT&#95;MAX)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If this is not the first PFd op, it should go into the other side</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of the processor to use the other FPd unit there. This should</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// generally happen if two FPd ops are placed with 2 other</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions between them (modulo 6).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SUCycleIdx = getCurrCycleIdx(SU);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LastFPdOpCycleIdx &gt; SUCycleIdx)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((LastFPdOpCycleIdx - SUCycleIdx) == 3);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((SUCycleIdx - LastFPdOpCycleIdx) == 3);</Highlight></CodeLine>
